thread.section_title: Arsenal star Alex Iwobi reveals Kelechi Iheanacho is trying to get him to join Manchester City – Metro
thread.title: Arsenal star Alex Iwobi reveals Kelechi Iheanacho is trying to get him to join Manchester City
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Alex Iwobi reveals Kelechi Iheanacho is trying to get him to join Manchester City

author: Tom Olver
title: Arsenal star Alex Iwobi reveals Kelechi Iheanacho is trying to get him to join Manchester City
text:
Kelechi Iheanacho wants Alex Iwobi at Manchester City (Picture: Getty) Arsenal ace Alex Iwobi has revealed that Manchester City forward Kelechi Iheanacho was trying to coax him to the Etihad during the international break.
Wenger fires warning to Chelsea over Sanchez pursuit The Gunners host Pep Guardiola’s men in a much-anticipated Premier League encounter on Sunday afternoon and the Nigerian pair could come face-to-face at the Emirates.
Arsene Wenger has lost the likes of Samir Nasri, Bacary Sagna and Gael Clichy to City in recent seasons and Iwobi has admitted his international colleague, Iheanacho, has been trying to lure him away from north London.
‘We have had a bit of banter this week,’ the 20-year-old Arsenal star told Sky Sports.
Arsene Wenger’s side host Manchester City this weekend (Picture: Getty) ‘He was trying to persuade me to come to Manchester City and I was trying to persuade him to come to Arsenal.
‘I would like to play against him. We have talked about the game a little bit, but we have been focused on playing for Nigeria.
More: Football 'Only one team in London' - Wenger's Chelsea taunt will come back to haunt Arsenal 
Chelsea transfer chief wants to sign £70m striker to prove Jose Mourinho wrong 
Manchester United offer £4m-a-year contract to in-form Belgium star 
‘I have just got to prepare now and beat him!’
MORE: Arsenal star set for shock fitness test ahead of Manchester City clash
